Roof_surface
============

.. table:: Algorithm
   :widths: 15 15 15

   +---------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+
   | **Algorithm Name**        | **What is this algorithm for?**   | **Description**                         |
   +===========================+===================================+=========================================+
   | roof_surface              | Variables                         | Calculate roof surface area.            |
   +---------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+
